column4: Microsoft Outlook service hit by outage
column5: A variety of online services from Microsoft Corp suffered outages for several hours on Tuesday across Western Europe and the Eastern United States  according to the company's technical support sites.

column4: Microsoft Outlook service hit by outage
column5: March 7 A variety of online services from Microsoft Corp suffered outages for several hours on Tuesday across Western Europe and the Eastern United States  according to the company's technical support sites.

column4: BRIEF-Acadian ties with Microsoft to explore asset forecasting
column5: * Acadian Asset Management announces agreement with Microsoft to explore asset forecasting using Bing Predicts

column4: Ex-Tesla manager seeks $4 billion for Europe's biggest battery plant
column5: STOCKHOLM A former Tesla executive is trying to raise at least $4 billion to build Europe's biggest battery factory in Sweden to meet an expected surge in demand as the region's automakers switch to electric vehicles.

column4: Ex-Tesla manager seeks $4 bln for Europe's biggest battery plant
column5: STOCKHOLM  March 7 A former Tesla executive is trying to raise at least $4 billion to build Europe's biggest battery factory in Sweden to meet an expected surge in demand as the region's automakers switch to electric vehicles.

column4: BRIEF-Qualcomm increases quarterly dividend by 7.5 pct to $0.57 per share of common stock
